title: Appstore
description: Download our apps and update as soon as new releases are available.
content: Download our apps and update as soon as new releases are available. No gatekeeping. Instant Updates.

title: Filedime
description: file explorer with rapid search, chatgpt like query for your files* locally, swift folder size compute, hot reload for markdown.
content: Filedime, an open source almost feature complete file explorer. Support multi-window, tabs, fzf like search, query your files* locally, swift folder size compute, hot reload for markdown. A  file readout* plugin is also available separately. *currently supports only select file types.

title: Background Apps and Process List
description: Force close apps that are running in the background.
manualtext: How to close background apps on Android TV
How to close background running process on Amazon FireTV stick
content: Force close apps that are running in the background.

title: Netspeed Test
description: Smart test lets you Check bandwidth in any app using multiwindow
content: Test Internet download speed, latency (ping), Smart test lets you Check bandwidth in any app of your choice using multiwindow to identify whether ISP is throttling data speeds for specific apps.

title: Wireless File Manager
description: Transfer, Manage files on your Android, Fire TV, Tablet, Phone (Internal Storage, External Storage) using any web browser.
manualtext: Transfer Files from MacOS, iOS to Fire TV
Explained: How to install App APKs on Android TVs
content: Send, Browse, Download files between devices between devices on your home network using your android.

title: Netspeed monitor (No permission version)
description: Monitor live bandwidth usage/ network speed.
manualtext: Allowing SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW on TV using another android device
Enabling Time Netspeed overlay using ADB Remote, Keyboard & Shell
content: Monitor live bandwidth usage/ network speed on your device.

title: Netspeed monitor
description: Monitor live bandwidth usage/ network speed.
manualtext: Allowing SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW on TV using another android device
Enabling Time Netspeed overlay using ADB Remote, Keyboard & Shell
content: Monitor live bandwidth usage/ network speed on PC (OSS) and smartphones (not OSS).

title: No Keyboard
description: A Simple, secure yet functional minimise able, hideable keyboard to keep you productive.
content: A Simple, secure yet functional minimise able, hideable keyboard with a popup remote for nav buttons to keep you productive even when using a bluetooth keyboard and mouse.

title: Taotlus
description: A launcher with search, iconless list, TV recommendations for frequently used apps etc.
content: A launcher with search, iconless list, TV recommendations for frequently used apps etc.

title: Valutare Calculator
description: A unique calculator that calculates as you type.
content: A unique calculator that calculates as you type.

title: Hemo
content: Chat with all your favourite text to text and text to image AIs in one place. Currently BYOK(Bring Your Own Key) is supported for openrouter and gemini, supports Ollama and LMStudio when running locally.

title: Weblinklist
content: Access your bookmarks from anywhere in the world. Unique orchestrator that interacts with floccus: bookmarks extension manager, dufs: WebDAV server. Has multiple backend options one made using Rust, one in NodeJS using NextJS, React.

title: File explorer
description: Fast, clean file explorer for android.
content: Fast, clean file explorer for android.

title: LogLinktoDisk
description: Completely Open Source Chrome, Firefox extension and a companion OSS rust server to save links to local storage like onetab and access from any PC on your local network.
content: Completely Open Source Chrome, Firefox extension and a companion OSS rust server to save links to local storage like onetab and access from any PC on your local network

title: NetSpeed Monitor for PC
description: Rust based netspeed monitor for PC.
content: Monitor live bandwidth usage/ network speed on PC (OSS) and smartphones (not OSS).

title: Perlink
description: Choose browser on a per link basis.
content: Choose browser on a per link basis.

title: Power Menu
content: A Simple, secure software power menu for android. No root needed, uses Accessibility permission.

title: Take notes
description: A note taking, time tracker app for android.
content: A note taking, time tracker app for android.

title: Software Volume Button
content: A Simple, secure root less way to access volume slider when the volume button isn't functional.

title: Prefstore
description: A simple, High Performance file explorer built in rust for PC.
content: Rust lib to save preferences with one line of code.
